channel.title: Vpn on A fractal spectrum of tales
channel.description: Recent content in Vpn on A fractal spectrum of tales

item.title: Socks proxy with ssh
item.description: When you work in the University, it is very likely that during a trip or the weekend you urge to connect via the University to have access to Journals and other academic resources. Often enough this requires long and complicated procedures involving the setup of rarely updated proprietary VPN softwares that sometimes like to install their obscure helpers to monitor the traffic and prevent you to open malicious websites. Helpers that would keep working in background sending to unspecified servers all your business even when the VPN is off…
